summary: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.
cast: Linda Blair|Vincent Van Patten|Peter Barton|Kevin Brophy|Jenny Neumann|Suki Goodwin|Jimmy Sturtevant|Hal Ralston|Carey Fox|Ron Gans|Gloria Heilman|Jean Hasselhoff|Nathan L. Truman
director: Director: Tom DeSimone (as Tom De Simone)
title: Noche infernal
